column5: 30 percent discount on stays of 2 weeks or more, 40 percent discount on stays of 3 weeks or more. Please send me message, I will send special offer.  This is a nice house in a wooded lot in a quiet neighborhood east of White Rock Lake. Gas fireplace, WiFi with Netflix. BBQ grill in the yard. It is a 2200 sq-ft house, 1 BR on first floor, 1 BR on 2nd floor, both with private bath. Study den with executive desk and 26\
